department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: hybrid female figure/water snake, with a woman's upper body, with very short arms held out, hands in loose fists; stylized, tentacle-like legs with upward-pointing claws on ends of legs; long, thick tail with fins on end; body and face painted overall in black and white with geometric designs and patterns; terra cotta-colored drop earrings tied to holes in ears with string
marks: Signature on bottom (\"knee\" area), in black: [LISA HOLT / (i
title: Pueblo Serpent Warrior
